title: Initial Project Setup
description: Configure the development environment, install dependencies, and ensure the application runs correctly at http://localhost:3000.
comments: Set up Flowbite and Tailwind CSS

title: Fix Security Vulnerabilities
description: Update Next.js to version 14.2.20 to resolve security vulnerabilities reported by npm audit (Cache Poisoning, Denial of Service).
comments: Verify application functionality after the update

title: Create Test Data in JSON Format
description: Generate the tasks.json file with sample data for the task management system.

title: Complete Project Documentation
description: Complete technical and user documentation, including setup, installation, and usage details for the application.
comments: Explain how to configure and run the app

title: Implement API Routes for Tasks
description: Develop the API routes to manage tasks (create, read, update, delete).
comments: Create the POST route to create tasks
Develop the GET route to fetch all tasks

title: Design User Interface for Tasks
description: Create the basic components to display and manage tasks in the user interface.
comments: Implement design with Flowbite and Tailwind

title: Implement Unit Tests for Functionalities
description: Write and run unit tests for functions related to tasks (CRUD operations).
comments: Test the POST route for tasks
